chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
items.plainText: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

items.text: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.
items.plainText: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.

items.text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.
items.plainText: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.

items.text: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.
items.plainText: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.

items.text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.
items.plainText: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.

items.text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.
items.plainText: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.

items.text: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?
items.plainText: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?

items.text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you.
items.plainText: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you.

items.text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.
items.plainText: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.

items.text: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.
items.plainText: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.

items.text: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.
items.plainText: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.

items.text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.
items.plainText: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.

items.text: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
items.plainText: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

items.text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
items.plainText: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

items.text: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.
items.plainText: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.

items.text: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
items.plainText: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.

items.text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
items.plainText: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

items.text: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.
items.plainText: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.

items.text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,
items.plainText: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,

items.text: Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,
items.plainText: Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,

items.text: Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.
items.plainText: Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.

items.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
items.plainText: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

items.text: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
items.plainText: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

items.text: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.
items.plainText: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.

items.text: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
items.plainText: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.

items.text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
items.plainText: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
